𒀀 Aᵇ letter A ᵕA WHA ≠ A 𓄿 𒀀𒅆 ÉR ligature 𒀝 𒂊 e

𒀀 AQUA ⇔ QUA-… question Interrogative pronoun prefix: 𐍈 wer wie wo wann wasser? e.g.:
𒀀𒊏𒍪 ᵛa-rá-zu Frage < 𒊏𒍪 rá-zu √roga (e.g. interrogate)

𒀀𒉌 whom wen wessen: 𓆑 who/whose 𓊪𓍢 he/his … 𓆑 -sein 𒋗𒉡 -šunu 𒅆𒈾 -šina seine 𒊭 ša!
𒀀𒉈𒉈 𓊪𓍢 whom wen wessen 𓆑 nun

𒀀𒈾 ana (Sumerisch): what? 哪? 𓈖𓄿 = 那 nà nam nämliches ⇔
¿MA? 𒀀 manner 𒈪𒉡 mīnu 𒄠𒈪𒉌 „wem?“ modus

Hittite words using 𒀀 ⋍ ᵐA / ᵛA

𒉿𒀀𒋻 wa-a-tar water (Hittite)
𒀀𒀀𒋻 µWater 𓈗 doubling
𒀀𒊒𒈾𒀸 µa-ru-na-aš 𓈗 marine Sea ⇔ Mare.Nauta/nostra

𒀀𒄿𒅖 µa-i-iš mouth > os < ors 𓂋
𒀀𒊭𒀭𒈾 ᵛašanna Wesen 𓃹𓃺 Essenz/Being/Sein
𒀀𒊭𒀀𒀭𒍝 ᵛašānz Wesen 𓃹 𓃺 Essenz/Being/Sein
𒀀𒆳 a-mat 𓌃 mot word ⇔ cry 𒈬𒌁 mu-ter mutter
𒀀𒀀𒊏 Maater 𓅐𓋬𓊖𓁦 Math⋍Truth/Ortho/Wahrheit 𓌴𓐙𓂝𓏜

𒀀𒊏𒀀𒀸 µarāš 𓅓 𓋴 𓁒 𓀀 mate, true friend ᵛarāind
𒀀𒀸𒅆𒅀𒋻 µāssiyatar 𓌻𓏏𓂋𓏥 motherly love ⇔ amore/merit 𓌻𓂋𓏏𓏥
𒀀𒀸𒋗𒍑 āššuš 𒉿𒀀𒋗𒍑 wāsus besser best : good 𒍑 ⇔ 𒀀𒇉𒌓𒄒𒉣 Euphrat
𒀀𒀊𒉺 µāppa after(wards),further,behind,back,again (wieder/wider)
𒀀𒊏𒌋𒉿𒀸 ᵛa-ra-u-wa-aš free 𐌰𐍂𐍅𐌾𐍉 ᵛarwɕu
𒀀𒀝𒉌𒅖 µAgni (Vedic God)
𒀀𒊏𒀀𒄑𒍣 aráːi̯t͡si arise
𒀀𒅆𒉿𒀭𒍝 ašiwanz ? poor
𒀀𒆷𒀝𒊭𒀭𒁺𒍑 Alâkšândûš Alexander of Homers Ilias
-𒀀𒀀𒄑𒍣 -a-a-iz-zi faisse (do) causative suffix
-𒀀𒀀𒄑𒍣 -a-a-iz-zi make (do) e.g.:
𒄿𒂵𒀀𒄑𒍣 𒂊𒃷 eᴵkán “ice” + -𒀀𒀀𒄑𒍣 -a-a-iz-zi => abkühln

ᵛA forced by preceding 𒉺 PA

𒉺𒀀𒄷𒌋𒌨 pa-a-ḫu-u-ur /pāhūr/ fire
𒉺𒀪𒄯 pa-aḫ-ḫur /paḫḫur/ fire
𒉺𒄴𒄯 paḫḫur pyro, fire, fever πῦρ (pûr), Old Armenian հ ուր (hur), Tocharian B puwar
